title: Bugs in Queue
body: So my friend who I play games with gets leaver buster a lot, that's fine, he is a bit of a tool some times and earned his punishment, my issue is that at the end of the 20 minutes, I sometimes get this "unknown error" which means I have to restart my client and we have to do the 20 minute wait again. I don't know how you could fix this, but it is a hassle and makes me kind of sad.
